name: Jarryd And The Jackles – Elementor Random Image
author: Jarryd And The Jackles

sections.description: A random collection of elementor widgets to help make adding obscure functionality easy.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the contents of jarrydandthejackles-elementor-random-image.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

If using the popup builder (you need to do that in order to register the popup post types.):
– Go to settings > permalinks and click save.
sections.faq:
Does this work?

Probably, if you use it correctly.

Additional

Please ask questions.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • FIX: Update support for Elementor version 3
  • UPDATE: Update wordsearch builder library
  • UPDATE: Update licence to GPLv3
  • UPDATE: Rename “Random Article” widget to “Random Image”
  • NEW: Added autoloader.
  • NEW: Add direction selector for wordsearch builder
  • NEW: Add wordsearch builder
